attributes.action: Prison is a place to reflect and address behaviour and consequences not to get playstations, digiboxes and movies at night
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The removal from convicted prisoners access to playstations, other video games devices, free view TV boxes and the playing of movies through the night. Or to supply the same enhancements for the use of the victims or the victims relatives.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
